law.text: Editor's note: Ord. No. 1987-79, §1, adopted Nov. 19, 1987, repealed §2-2032, which pertained to requirement for Council approval in certain cases and derived from §2-2032 of the City's 1959 Code as amended by Ord. No. 1980-287, §1, adopted Jan. 8, 1980; Ord. No. 1980-425, §1, adopted July 15, 1980; and Ord. No. 1982-914, §§1, 2, adopted May 18, 1982.
